security_constraints.name: Data Encryption Enhancement
security_constraints.constraint_statement: The system shall implement state-of-the-art encryption for all data in transit and at rest.
security_constraints.rationale: To ensure that customer financial data is protected against unauthorized access and data theft.
security_constraints.enforcement_mechanism: Implementation of industry-standard encryption protocols and regular security assessments.

mission_impact_if_violated.capability_degradation: Compromise of customer trust and integrity of financial transactions.

security_constraints.name: Load Management Constraint
security_constraints.constraint_statement: The system shall automatically scale resources to handle peak loads without degradation in service.
security_constraints.rationale: To prevent system downtime during peak periods, ensuring continuous ability to process payments.
security_constraints.enforcement_mechanism: Use of cloud-based auto-scaling and load balancing technologies.

mission_impact_if_violated.capability_degradation: Inability to provide financial services during critical periods.

security_constraints.name: Software Maintenance Constraint
security_constraints.constraint_statement: The system shall ensure all software components are up-to-date and free from known vulnerabilities.
security_constraints.rationale: To protect against security breaches that exploit outdated or unpatched software.
security_constraints.enforcement_mechanism: Regular software updates and vulnerability assessments.

mission_impact_if_violated.capability_degradation: Exposure to security breaches and data theft.

security_constraints.name: GDPR Compliance Constraint
security_constraints.constraint_statement: The system shall adhere to all GDPR requirements for European customer data at all times.
security_constraints.rationale: To ensure compliance with data protection regulations and avoid regulatory fines.
security_constraints.enforcement_mechanism: Implementing data protection and privacy controls specific to GDPR.

mission_impact_if_violated.capability_degradation: Legal sanctions and loss of reputation in the European market.

security_constraints.name: Fraud Detection Enhancement
security_constraints.constraint_statement: The system shall employ advanced fraud detection and monitoring mechanisms for all transactions.
security_constraints.rationale: To minimize financial loss due to fraudulent transactions and enhance customer trust.
security_constraints.enforcement_mechanism: Integration of machine learning-based fraud detection tools and continuous transaction monitoring.

mission_impact_if_violated.capability_degradation: Increased financial losses and erosion of customer confidence in the banking platform.
